title: By the Queene. A proclamation to represse all piracies and depredations vpon the seas
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: in Powles Churchyarde by Richarde Iugge and John Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maiestie,
notes: A proclamation forbidding intercourse with pirates and calling for their repression.
